data.lyric:
[ti:Up All Night]
[ar:Khalid]
[al:Up All Night]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Up All Night - Khalid
[00:01.55]Lyrics by：Khalid Robinson/Jamil Chammas/Jeremy Malvin
[00:03.10]Composed by：Khalid Robinson/Jamil Chammas/Jeremy Malvin
[00:04.65]Take me around the world and back again
[00:09.79]As I'm searching for my soul out there
[00:14.88]Oh there's something that I'm wondering
[00:19.95]Where I'm going when my story ends
[00:24.49]Doesn't even matter anyway no
[00:27.03]Focused and I'm coping with the pain yeah we're
[00:29.59]Only getting older by the day yeah we're
[00:32.24]Only getting older
[00:34.70]Doesn't even matter anyway no
[00:37.29]Focused and I'm coping with the pain yeah we're
[00:39.77]Only getting older by the day yeah we're
[00:42.34]Only getting older
[00:45.45]Keeps me up all night
[00:48.08]Keeps me
[00:49.26]Get these thoughts that keep me up all night
[00:53.18]Keeps me
[00:55.56]Keeps me up all night
[00:58.30]Keeps me
[00:59.63]Get these thoughts that keep me up all night
[01:03.39]Keeps me
[01:05.89]So I'ma light it up I'm gettin high
[01:08.95]So high
[01:11.15]Ask me how I am I'm getting by
[01:16.04]But I'm thankful that I'm still alive
[01:21.20]'Cause there's so much more left to find
[01:25.74]Doesn't even matter anyway no
[01:28.30]Focused and I'm coping with the pain yeah we're
[01:30.82]Only getting older by the day yeah we're
[01:33.44]Only getting older
[01:35.92]Doesn't even matter anyway no
[01:38.52]Focused and I'm coping with the pain yeah we're
[01:41.05]Only getting older by the day yeah we're
[01:43.66]Only getting older
[01:46.68]Keeps me up all night
[01:49.35]Keeps me
[01:50.63]Get these thoughts that keep me up all night
[01:54.38]Keeps me
[01:57.03]Keeps me up all night
[01:59.45]Keeps me
[02:00.68]Get these thoughts that keep me up all night
[02:04.46]Keeps me
[02:27.37]Keeps me up all night
[02:30.11]Keeps me
data.trans:
[ti:Up All Night]
[ar:Khalid]
[al:Up All Night]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.55]//
[00:03.10]//
[00:04.65]带我环游世界再回来
[00:09.79]让我寻找自己的灵魂
[00:14.88]有些事情我很想知道
[00:19.95]当我的故事结束时 我会去哪里
[00:24.49]不过无所谓
[00:27.03]我聚精会神 勇敢面对伤悲
[00:29.59]我们只会一天天变老
[00:32.24]我们只会越来越老
[00:34.70]不过无所谓
[00:37.29]我聚精会神 勇敢面对伤悲
[00:39.77]我们只会一天天变老
[00:42.34]我们只会越来越老
[00:45.45]让我彻夜难眠
[00:48.08]让我
[00:49.26]千头万绪 让我彻夜难眠
[00:53.18]让我
[00:55.56]让我彻夜难眠
[00:58.30]让我
[00:59.63]千头万绪 让我彻夜难眠
[01:03.39]让我
[01:05.89]所以我要点一根烟 我要兴奋起来
[01:08.95]好兴奋
[01:11.15]我勉强度日
[01:16.04]不过好在我还活着
[01:21.20]因为这世界还有那么多值得探索的东西
[01:25.74]不过无所谓
[01:28.30]我聚精会神 勇敢面对伤悲
[01:30.82]我们只会一天天变老
[01:33.44]我们只会越来越老
[01:35.92]不过无所谓
[01:38.52]我聚精会神 勇敢面对伤悲
[01:41.05]我们只会一天天变老
[01:43.66]我们只会越来越老
[01:46.68]让我彻夜难眠

[01:54.38]让我
